title: Vestas Wind Systems Weekly News Summary
body:
**Vestas Wind Systems Weekly News Summary**

**Key Developments:**

- **Analyst Ratings:**
  - *December 12, 2025:* Jyske Bank maintained a 'Buy' recommendation for Vestas Wind Systems A (VWDRY). ([nasdaq.com](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/jyske-bank-maintains-vestas-wind-systems-vwdry-buy-recommendation?utm_source=openai))

- **Price Target Adjustments:**
  - *December 6, 2025:* The average one-year price target for Vestas Wind Systems A was revised to $8.03 per share, indicating an 8.81% decrease from the latest reported closing price. ([nasdaq.com](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/jyske-bank-maintains-vestas-wind-systems-vwdry-buy-recommendation?utm_source=openai))

- **Operational Updates:**
  - *October 20, 2025:* Vestas announced the suspension of a significant factory development in Szczecin, Poland, due to rising material costs and weak demand forecasts for offshore wind in Europe. ([gurufocus.com](https://www.gurufocus.com/news/3149938/vestas-vwdry-halts-polish-factory-plans-amid-rising-costs-and-low-demand?utm_source=openai))

**Key Dates:**

- **December 12, 2025:** Jyske Bank maintained a 'Buy' recommendation for Vestas Wind Systems A (VWDRY). ([nasdaq.com](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/jyske-bank-maintains-vestas-wind-systems-vwdry-buy-recommendation?utm_source=openai))

- **December 6, 2025:** The average one-year price target for Vestas Wind Systems A was revised to $8.03 per share, indicating an 8.81% decrease from the latest reported closing price. ([nasdaq.com](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/jyske-bank-maintains-vestas-wind-systems-vwdry-buy-recommendation?utm_source=openai))

- **October 20, 2025:** Vestas announced the suspension of a significant factory development in Szczecin, Poland, due to rising material costs and weak demand forecasts for offshore wind in Europe. ([gurufocus.com](https://www.gurufocus.com/news/3149938/vestas-vwdry-halts-polish-factory-plans-amid-rising-costs-and-low-demand?utm_source=openai))

**Sentiment:**

The overall sentiment for Vestas Wind Systems this week is neutral. While the company received a maintained 'Buy' recommendation from Jyske Bank, the downward revision of the price target and the suspension of the Polish factory project due to economic challenges balance the outlook.

**Key Points:**

1. Jyske Bank maintained a 'Buy' recommendation for Vestas Wind Systems A (VWDRY) on December 12, 2025. ([nasdaq.com](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/jyske-bank-maintains-vestas-wind-systems-vwdry-buy-recommendation?utm_source=openai))

2. The average one-year price target for Vestas Wind Systems A was revised to $8.03 per share on December 6, 2025, indicating an 8.81% decrease from the latest reported closing price. ([nasdaq.com](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/jyske-bank-maintains-vestas-wind-systems-vwdry-buy-recommendation?utm_source=openai))

3. Vestas suspended a significant factory development in Szczecin, Poland, on October 20, 2025, due to rising material costs and weak demand forecasts for offshore wind in Europe. ([gurufocus.com](https://www.gurufocus.com/news/3149938/vestas-vwdry-halts-polish-factory-plans-amid-rising-costs-and-low-demand?utm_source=openai))

key_dates.title: Jyske Bank Maintains 'Buy' Recommendation
key_dates.importance_for_price: Positive sentiment from Jyske Bank's maintained 'Buy' recommendation may support investor confidence and stabilize the stock price.

key_dates.title: Price Target Revised to $8.03
key_dates.importance_for_price: The downward revision of the price target to $8.03 per share could exert downward pressure on the stock price as it reflects reduced growth expectations.

key_dates.title: Suspension of Polish Factory Project
key_dates.importance_for_price: The suspension of the Polish factory project due to economic challenges may raise concerns about Vestas' operational expansion and impact investor sentiment negatively.

key_points.text: Jyske Bank maintained a 'Buy' recommendation for Vestas Wind Systems A (VWDRY) on December 12, 2025.
The average one-year price target for Vestas Wind Systems A was revised to $8.03 per share on December 6, 2025, indicating an 8.81% decrease from the latest reported closing price.
Vestas suspended a significant factory development in Szczecin, Poland, on October 20, 2025, due to rising material costs and weak demand forecasts for offshore wind in Europe.
